item.title: NASä¸Šæ­å»ºOpengrokä»£ç æœç´¢å¼•æ“
item.description: NASä¸Šæ­å»ºOpengrokä»£ç æœç´¢å¼•æ“ ä¸€. åŠŸèƒ½èƒŒæ™¯ ä½¿ç”¨opengrokæ­å»ºå¤šé¡¹ç›®æœç´¢ opengrok-1.1-rc34 ubuntu18.04 + tomcat8 + ctags + openjdk-8 äºŒ. è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ›å»ºã€åŒæ­¥è„šæœ¬ #!/bin/bash LOCAL_PATH=`pwd` WEB_APP="/var/lib/tomcat8/webapps" createPrj(){ export OPENGROK_GENERATE_HISTORY=0 export OPENGROK_INSTANCE_BASE=$LOCAL_PATH/index/$1 export OPENGROK_WEBAPP_NAME=$1 export OPENGROK_WEBAPP_CONTEXT=$1 export OPENGROK_WEBAPP_CFGADDR=http://localhost:8080/$1 ./bin/OpenGrok deploy } indexPrj(){ ./bin/OpenGrok index $LOCAL_PATH/database/$1 } rootHtml(){ projects="" indexInfo="" html=$(cat "./ROOT/index.html") for dir in `ls $WEB_APP`;do if [[ -d "$WEB_APP/$dir" ]] && [[ "ROOT" != $dir ]]; then projects="<li><a href=\"/$dir/\">$dir</a></li>\n""$projects" indexLog="./index/$dir/log/opengrok0.0.log" lastIndex=`stat --format=%y $indexLog` lastIndex=${lastIndex%.*} indexInfo="<li><b>$lastIndex</b> - New Index: <a href=\"/$dir/\">$dir</a></li>\n""$indexInfo" fi done html=${html//projects/$projects} html=${html//project_index/$indexInfo} rm -rf $WEB_APP/ROOT mkdir -p $WEB_APP/ROOT echo -e "$html" >$WEB_APP/ROOT/index.html cp ./ROOT/style.css $WEB_APP/ROOT/style.css rm -rf $WEB_APP/*.war }
